name: Braised Mushroom Chicken Thighs
author: Holly Nilsson - spendwithpennies.com

ingredients.name: lbs chicken thighs with bone and skin

instructions:
Instructions
1. Preheat oven to 425°F
2. Season chicken with salt & pepper. Set aside.
3. Heat butter and oil in a 10 inch skillet over high heat. Add chicken (skin side down) and brown without moving the chicken, about 4-5 minutes. Remove from pan and set aside.
4. Quickly toss the mushrooms with soy sauce. Cook mushrooms, garlic, thyme and rosemary until mushrooms are tender, about 5 minutes.
5. Add chicken broth and white wine. Simmer 2 minutes.
6. Place seasoned chicken, skin side up over the mushrooms.
7. Bake 35-40 minutes or until chicken reaches 165°F. Broil 1 minute if desired.
8. Spoon mushroom sauce over chicken. Garnish with parsley and serve.

Notes
Do not add soy sauce to mushrooms ahead of time, this will remove too much moisture from the mushrooms.
